::SnowCat::

She walked in just in time to hear Ramulus say to grab a device and 
move out.  She walked over and picked up a device.  She attached it 
to her wrist and followed Ramulus out.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus nods. "Allright, but that's the only weapon we have agains 
> those chips so far. We have a meeting with The Trainers, a new 
> faction. They have captured, and probably implanted these chips, on 
> Striker and Spears. I have a meeting with their leader, but in case 
> things start going wrong, we need to be ready."
> 
> He gestures toward the pile of cloaking devices, adressing everyone 
> else. "Everyone grab a cloaking device, we're moving out!"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > "Thanks, whats the game and who's the players?" Lunarpine was 
> willing to
> > hear things out, he fealt a debt to these maximals. without them 
> he'd
> > probably still be stuck in the wilderness. He also felt a debt to 
> Veratis,
> > he still wasn't sure why yet but the wolf in him now felt 
complete.
> > 
> > He looked at the launcher and chip he held in his hands 
> "Impressive" his
> > hand caressed the side like something long cared for then 
lost. "But
> > irrelovent." he lowered the launcher to the table it origionated 
on 
> and
> > stepped back. he didn't feal forced to, but somehow obligated to 
> respect
> > Veratis' wishes regaurding the posession of weapons of any sort.
